fireDialogHeaderNoTabs.title: Notīrīt datus
fireDialogHeaderNoTabs.note: Dialog header when tab clearing is disabled.

optionCurrentSite.title: Tikai pašreizējā vietne
optionCurrentSite.note: Dropdown option to only clear data for the current active website

optionLastHour.title: Pēdējā stunda
optionLastHour.note: Dropdown option to only clear data from the past hour

optionLast24Hour.title: Pēdējās 24 stundas
optionLast24Hour.note: Dropdown option to only clear data from the past 24 hours

optionLast7days.title: Pēdējās 7 dienas
optionLast7days.note: Dropdown option to only clear data from the past 7 days

optionLast4Weeks.title: Pēdējās 4 nedēļas
optionLast4Weeks.note: Dropdown option to only clear data from the past 4 weeks

optionAllTime.title: Visu laiku
optionAllTime.note: Dropdown option to clear all data, since recording started

historyDuration.title: {duration, select, hour {viena stunda} day {24 stundas} week {viena nedēļa} month {4 nedēļas} other {Viss}}
historyDuration.note: Description of what period of history data should be deleted.

summaryClearTabsHistoryDuration.title: {openTabs, plural, zero {Aizvērt {openTabs} cilnes un notīrīt pārlūkošanas vēsturi un sīkfailus ({durationDesc})?} one {Aizvērt {openTabs} cilni un notīrīt pārlūkošanas vēsturi un sīkfailus ({durationDesc})?} other {Aizvērt {openTabs} cilnes un notīrīt pārlūkošanas vēsturi un sīkfailus ({durationDesc})?}}
summaryClearTabsHistoryDuration.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. Placeholders stand for: 1. the number of tabs that will be affected; 2. the timespan of data to be removed (translated separately with key historyDuration). Example: Close 3 tabs and clear 2 weeks of browsing…

summaryClearTabsDuration.title: {openTabs, plural, zero {Aizvērt {openTabs} cilnes un notīrīt sīkfailus ({durationDesc})?} one {Aizvērt {openTabs} cilni un notīrīt sīkfailus ({durationDesc})?} other {Aizvērt {openTabs} cilnes un notīrīt sīkfailus ({durationDesc})?}}
summaryClearTabsDuration.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. Placeholders stand for: 1. the number of tabs that will be affected; 2. the timespan of data to be removed (translated separately with key historyDuration). Example: Close 3 tabs and clear 2 weeks of cookies?

summaryClearHistoryDuration.title: Notīrīt pārlūkošanas vēsturi un sīkfailus ({durationDesc})?
summaryClearHistoryDuration.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. The placeholder stands for the timespan of data to be removed (translated separately with key historyDuration). Example: Clear 2 weeks of browsing…

summaryClearCookiesDuration.title: Notīrīt sīkfailus ({durationDesc})?
summaryClearCookiesDuration.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. The placeholder stands for the timespan of data to be removed (translated separately with key historyDuration). Example: Clear 2 weeks of cookies?

summaryClearTabsHistoryAll.title: Aizvērt {openTabs} {openTabs, plural, =1 {tab} other {tabs}} un notīrīt visu pārlūkošanas vēsturi un sīkfailus ({cookies} {cookies, plural, =1 {site} other {sites}})?
summaryClearTabsHistoryAll.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. The placeholders are for the number of tabs to be closed, and the number of sites where we'll clear cookies. Example: Close 3 tabs, and clear browsing history and cookies (2 sites)?

summaryClearTabsAll.title: Aizvērt {openTabs}{openTabs, plural, =1 {tab} other {tabs}} un notīrīt visus sīkfailus ({cookies} {cookies, plural, =1 {site} other {sites}})?
summaryClearTabsAll.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. The placeholders are for the number of tabs to be closed, and the number of sites where we'll clear cookies. Example: Close 3 tabs, and clear all cookies (2 sites)?

summaryClearHistoryAll.title: {cookies, plural, zero {Notīrīt visu pārlūkošanas vēsturi un sīkfailus ({cookies} vietnes)?} one {Notīrīt visu pārlūkošanas vēsturi un sīkfailus ({cookies} vietne)?} other {Notīrīt visu pārlūkošanas vēsturi un sīkfailus ({cookies} vietnes)?}}
summaryClearHistoryAll.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. The placeholders stand for the number of sites where we'll clear cookies. Example: Clear all browsing history and cookies (2 sites)?

summaryClearCookiesAll.title: {cookies, plural, zero {Notīrīt visus sīkfailus ({cookies} vietnes)?} one {Notīrīt visus sīkfailus ({cookies} vietne)?} other {Notīrīt visus sīkfailus ({cookies} vietnes)?}}
summaryClearCookiesAll.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. The placeholders stand for the number of sites where we'll clear cookies. Example: Clear all cookies (2 sites)?

summaryClearTabsHistorySite.title: {openTabs, plural, zero {Aizvērt {openTabs} {site} cilnes un notīrīt visus {site} sīkfailus?} one {Aizvērt {openTabs} {site} cilni un notīrīt visus {site} sīkfailus?} other {Aizvērt {openTabs} {site} cilnes un notīrīt visus {site} sīkfailus?}}
summaryClearTabsHistorySite.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. Example: "Close 3 example.com tabs, and clear all example.com cookies?".

summaryClearTabsSite.title: {openTabs, plural, zero {Aizvērt {openTabs} {site} cilnes un notīrīt visus {site} sīkfailus?} one {Aizvērt {openTabs} {site} cilni un notīrīt visus {site} sīkfailus?} other {Aizvērt {openTabs} {site} cilnes un notīrīt visus {site} sīkfailus?}}
summaryClearTabsSite.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. Example: "Close 3 example.com tabs, and clear all example.com cookies?".

summaryClearHistorySite.title: Notīrīt visu {site} pārlūkošanas vēsturi un sīkfailus?
summaryClearHistorySite.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. Example: Clear all example.com browsing history and cookies?

summaryClearCookiesSite.title: Notīrīt visus {site} sīkfailus?
summaryClearCookiesSite.note: Description of data to be removed after the user submits the form. Clear all example.com cookies?

summaryPinnedIgnored.title: {tabs, plural, zero {{tabs} piespraustās cilnes tiks ignorētas.} one {{tabs} piespraustā cilne tiks ignorēta.} other {{tabs} piespraustās cilnes tiks ignorētas.}}
summaryPinnedIgnored.note: Notice to tell the user that some tabs will not be closed. Example: 3 pinned tabs will be ignored.

clearData.title: Notīrīt
clearData.note: Button text to start data clearing.

cancel.title: Atcelt
cancel.note: Button text to exit the fire button modal.

historyAndDownloadsNotAffected.title: Lai notīrītu arī vēsturi, atlasi laika periodu.
historyAndDownloadsNotAffected.note: Notice to tell the user that the chosen clearing settings will not affect history and downloads because a time period has not been selected from the dropdown.
